solution_line_template: Jolyn is {jolyn_older_than_therese} + {therese_older_than_aivo} = <<{jolyn_older_than_therese}+{therese_older_than_aivo}={jolyn_older_than_aivo}>>{jolyn_older_than_aivo} months older than Aivo.
Since Leon is {leon_older_than_aivo} months older than Aivo, then Jolyn is {jolyn_older_than_aivo} - {leon_older_than_aivo} = {jolyn_older_than_leon} months older than Leon.
